description:
Akari Acura is a beautiful green-haired girl with blue eyes, who is also a saboteur like her older brother http://anidb.net/ch62587 [Tooru]. She is a girl of strong character and has a job to support their living, as her brother will not work. She worships her brother fervently, to the extent that one day she wants to make him a stuffed specimen. She tags along her brother who has decided to venture on a journey with http://anidb.net/ch62586 [Chaika].
Source: ANN
name: Akari Acura
